articles.title: Christopher Chandler, Founder of Legatum, wins defamation case and is awarded $8,000,001 damages by jury
articles.metaDescription: A Washington, D.C. jury delivered a verdict in favour of Christopher Chandler after finding that Donald Berlin and his company Investigative Consultants Inc. published false statements about him in a defamatory dossier.

articles.title: US Court Rules Defamatory Dossier About Christopher Chandler Is False
articles.metaDescription: A US federal court judge has determined that the accusations against our Founder are entirely false.

articles.title: GB News announces major shareholder investment, new talent and programmes
articles.metaDescription: GB News has secured a commitment for a new £60 million capital injection to accelerate its growth, innovation, and investment in British journalism.

articles.title: Statement by Legatum
articles.metaDescription: Following an unprecedented legal challenge, Chris Bryant MP retracts false claims about Christopher Chandler first made in Parliament﻿.

articles.title: Legatum Commits Extra $26m to Combat NTDs
articles.metaDescription: Legatum Commits Extra $26m to Combat NTDs

articles.title: Statement by Legatum
articles.metaDescription: Statement by Legatum on Member of Parliament’s acceptance that false allegations against Christopher Chander have been disproved

articles.title: Niger Poised to Eliminate River Blindness
articles.metaDescription: Legatum reacts to news that Niger has become the first African country to eliminate River Blindness

articles.title: MPL becomes a unicorn
articles.metaDescription: Mobile esports platform Mobile Premier League raises Series E round of funding from Legatum Capital at a pre-money valuation of $2.3 billion USD.

articles.title: Why Legatum invested in GB News
articles.metaDescription: Britain is entering a new phase in her history, regaining an independent voice and charting a new path into the 21st Century.

articles.title: Legatum Center at MIT launches the Foundry Fellowship
articles.metaDescription: We are proud to see the launch of the Legatum Centre at MIT’s Foundry Fellowship, an exciting leadership programme for talented entrepreneurs in Africa.

articles.title: GB News starts hiring, announces senior appointments
articles.metaDescription: GB News launches a national recruitment drive to employ 140 people nationwide as it begins building Britain’s biggest new news channel in 30 years.

articles.title: Investors give go-ahead for GB News
articles.metaDescription: GB News has finalised its investment to launch a boldly different 24-hour television and digital news service to bring more choice to British viewers.
